alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 10:43AM CDT until July 16 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Little Sioux River above Spencer / Highway 18 affecting Clay County. Little Sioux River near Montgomery affecting Dickinson County. Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 10.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 14.2 Wed 9 AM 13.4 12.2 11.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
